description:
Staryu is a basic, water-type Pok√©mon which resembles a starfish. At its core is a jewel like Starmie`s but Staryu`s is circular. It has the power to regenerate its points if any of them breaks off.
In the anime, Misty uses Staryu along with its evolved form Starmie in and out of battles.
name: Hitodeman
